column2: you can use it to define functions you always want to have available in WordMat
column3: or to change settings in Maxima. Using the code file will make calculations a bit slower. \nCode fields can be inserted via the definition menu
column4: and are fields in the Word document where you can insert the Maximum Code
column5: which is run at each calculation. Code in the code file and code fields are sent directly to Maxima unprocessed. Any code error will cause WordMat to fail all calculations
column6: so beware. Look in the menu under Help > Manual > Help with Maxima Commands
